name: GRIP: Combat Racing
description: GRIP is a high octane, hardcore combat racer, packing ferocious speed and armed to the teeth with heavy weapons.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64bit Processor: Intel Core i3-3220 or AMD FX-6300 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce 560 or Radeon 6850 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 8 GB available space Additional Notes: Microsoft Xbox Controller for Windows® (or equivalent) is recommended.
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64bit or Newer Processor: Intel Core i5-3570K or AMD FX-8320 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia 970 or Radeon 380 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 8 GB available space Additional Notes: Microsoft Xbox Controller for Windows® (or equivalent) is recommended.
